Class IntegerMaxHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap.IntegerMaxHeap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntegerHeap

    public class IntegerMaxHeap
extends Object
implements IntegerHeap
    Binary heap for primitive types.
